text: It's been a tough few months for Bruce Jenner. First it was reported the 65 - year - old former Olympian would be transitioning into a woman and it was not met so well by all members of his family. Then he was involved in a fatal car crash, which has allegedly derailed filming of his new reality spinoff show. Now TMZ is claiming Kim, Khloe, and Kourtney Kardashian are planning to keep their distance from the patriarch, eventually wedging him out of their reality show Keeping Up With The Kardashians completely. Scroll down for video Phasing out : According to a new report by TMZ, ( L to R ) Kim, Khloe, and Kourtney Kardashian plan on driving Bruce Jenner out of Keeping Up
